name: IpSolveStatistics
brief:
Statistics collected during optimization run

SolveStatistics provides post-solve information accessible via
IpoptApplication::Statistics(). Captures optimization outcomes
at the time of construction from internal Ipopt objects.

Available statistics:
- Iteration count
- Final objective value
- Final constraint violation (primal infeasibility)
- Final optimality error (dual infeasibility)
- Final complementarity
- Timing information
see: IpIpoptApplication.hpp for accessing statistics after solve
